Articles.Content:
So, I have this plane toy a mess around with alot, and it's basically a generic looking bomber, but curiously, it has wheels instead of back landing gear, and I couldn't find any mention of it's name on the internet, and I made it in game, It uses TweakScale, BDArmoury and Kerbal Aircraft Expansion for the propellor. It utilizes a pair of two mk82 SnakeEye bombs, and another pair of two plain mk82 bombs, the 0 key drops the snake-eyes and the 9 key drops the mk82's, it flies okay, but sometimes the propellor collides with the ground before takeoff and snaps off (though I believe I have fixed this) and it even flew okay when I forgot symmetry and only had elevons on one side! Coming soon to the SAP-C Page! (In Rocket Builders) Where you can find multiple beautiful and fearsome Military craft, and like, 2 rubbish non-military craft. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/130374-SSI-ASAIB-PB-Conglomerate-Looking-for-anyone-to-join! [/shameless plug]

Here's the beaut! Thar she blows!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

And download link.

Have a nice flight!

I hope you enjoy it!

Edited August 18, 2015 by Sharkman Briton
